cause.description:
My Chemical Romance worked so hard to get to where they are...and i'm sick and tired of listening to people say how much they suck. These guys are the greatest band ever and deserve the best. Show your love for MCR and Gerard, Bob, Mikey, Frank, and Ray by joining the cause.
1. Promote MCR every day, second, month, year or face death.
2. Argue with very person who says MCR sucks and light them on fire.
3. Whenever anyone says Bob, Frank, Mikey, Gerard, or Ray, scream and go OMG *insert name here* I HEART THEM
cause.mission: promote MCR and The Black Parade
cause.name: Long Live The Black Parade
